es.p3.1: Participaci贸n de la Sociedad Civil en la Protecci贸n del Medio Ambiente 筐
es.p3.2: La sociedad civil juega un papel s煤per importante en la defensa del medio ambiente. Aqu铆 te dejo c贸mo:
es.p3.3: Formas de participaci贸n: Organizaciones No Gubernamentales (ONGs): Grupos como Greenpeace, WWF o Sierra Club promueven campa帽as, denuncian da帽os ambientales y educan a la poblaci贸n.
es.p3.4: Movimientos Sociales y Protestas: Ejemplo: las marchas por el clima, encabezadas por j贸venes como Greta Thunberg, que exigen a gobiernos y empresas que act煤en frente al cambio clim谩tico.
es.p3.5: Voluntariado Ambiental: Muchas personas se suman a actividades de reforestaci贸n, limpieza de r铆os, reciclaje comunitario, etc.
es.p3.6: Educaci贸n Ambiental: Desde escuelas hasta talleres comunitarios, la gente impulsa la conciencia ecol贸gica en su entorno.

es.p3.10: M茅xico: El Frente de Pueblos en Defensa de la Tierra y el Agua ha luchado contra proyectos que da帽an ecosistemas .

en.p3.1: Civil Society Participation in Environmental Protection 筐
en.p3.2: Civil society plays a super important role in defending the environment. Here's how:
en.p3.3: Forms of Participation: Non-Governmental Organizations (NGOs): Groups like Greenpeace, WWF, or Sierra Club promote campaigns, report environmental damage, and educate the public.
en.p3.4: Social Movements and Protests: Example: climate marches led by youth like Greta Thunberg, demanding governments and companies to act against climate change.
en.p3.5: Environmental Volunteering: Many people join activities like reforestation, river cleanups, community recycling, etc.
en.p3.6: Environmental Education: From schools to community workshops, people promote ecological awareness in their surroundings.
en.p3.7: Citizen Pressure: Through petitions, digital signatures, and social media, citizens can push for greener laws or stop destructive megaprojects.
en.p3.8: Responsible Consumption: Choosing eco-friendly products, reducing plastic use, and supporting sustainable companies are daily forms of activism.
en.p3.10: Mexico: The Frente de Pueblos en Defensa de la Tierra y el Agua has fought against projects that harm ecosystems.
en.p3.11: Latin America: Indigenous communities defend their territories from mining and deforestation, promoting a harmonious relationship with nature.
en.p3.12: World: Global movements like Fridays for Future mobilize millions to demand climate justice.
en.p3.13: International Agreements on the Environment (Paris Agreement Argentina 2030)
